EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Migrating An ESB to a Cloud-Native Platform white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Migrating An ESB to a Cloud-Native Platform white paper authored by Pivotal’s Michael Coté and Rohit Kelapure. We hope you find it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Microservices eBook: Migrating to Cloud-Native Application Architectures <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures]]> - Analyst Report: Gartner’s Market Guide for Application Platforms <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/gartner-market-guide-for-application-platforms]]> - Podcasts: Pivotal Conversations with Coté <[[https://soundcloud.com/pivotalconversations]]> - White Paper: Crossing the Value Stream: Improving Development with Pivotal and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/crossing-the-value-stream-improving-development-with-pivotal-and-cloud-foundry]]> - Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - eBook: Cloud Foundry: The Cloud-Native Platform <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-the-cloud-native-platform]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]> - White Paper: The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform]]> - White Paper: Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/containers-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
